title: Transit through Canada without a visa
manual: Transit through Canada without a visa
heading_path: Transit through Canada without a visa
text:
Published Time: Wed, 11 Feb 2026 22:37:45 GMT

Transit through Canada without a visa
=====================================

You may be eligible to transit through a Canadian airport without a visa if you are travelling to and from the United States (U.S.), and meet certain requirements.

See if you’re eligible to transit without a visa
------------------------------------------------

Find out if you are eligible to transit through a Canadian airport without a visa through the:

* [Transit Without Visa Program](https://www.canada.ca/en/immigration-refugees-citizenship/services/visit-canada/transit/without-visa/eligibility.html)
* [China Transit Program](https://www.canada.ca/en/immigration-refugees-citizenship/services/visit-canada/transit/without-visa/china-transit-eligibility.html)

Take part as an airport authority or airline
--------------------------------------------

Find out how an airport authority or airline can take part in the:

* [Transit Without Visa Program](https://www.canada.ca/en/immigration-refugees-citizenship/services/visit-canada/transit/without-visa/airport-authority-airline.html)
* [China Transit Program](https://www.canada.ca/en/immigration-refugees-citizenship/services/visit-canada/transit/without-visa/china-transit-airport-authority-airline.html)

Features
--------

Page details
------------
